# Interface CreateMemoryInterface

Interface for parameters needed to create a memory instance.

interface CreateMemoryInterface {  
embedder: [TextEmbedder](/classes/primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder);  
flashMemory: [FlashMemoryConfigInterface](./primitives_memory_flash_memory_config.FlashMemoryConfigInterface);  
llm: [LLM](/classes/primitives_llm_llm.LLM);  
longTermMemory: [LongTermMemoryConfigInterface](./primitives_memory_long_term_memory_config.LongTermMemoryConfigInterface);  
retrievalConfig?: [RetrievalConfigInterface](./common_types.RetrievalConfigInterface);  
returnRollingSummary?: boolean;  
rollingSummary: [RollingSummaryConfigInterface](./primitives_memory_rolling_summary_config.RollingSummaryConfigInterface);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

embedder flashMemory llm longTermMemory retrievalConfig? returnRollingSummary? rollingSummary

## Properties

### embedder

embedder: [TextEmbedder](/classes/primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Text embedder for vector representation of memory

### flashMemory

flashMemory: [FlashMemoryConfigInterface](./primitives_memory_flash_memory_config.FlashMemoryConfigInterface)

Configuration for flash memory

### llm

llm: [LLM](/classes/primitives_llm_llm.LLM)

LLM instance for processing memory

### longTermMemory

longTermMemory: [LongTermMemoryConfigInterface](./primitives_memory_long_term_memory_config.LongTermMemoryConfigInterface)

Configuration for long-term memory

### `Optional`retrievalConfig

retrievalConfig?: [RetrievalConfigInterface](./common_types.RetrievalConfigInterface)

Optional retrieval configuration

### `Optional`returnRollingSummary

returnRollingSummary?: boolean

Whether to return rolling summary in memory output

### rollingSummary

rollingSummary: [RollingSummaryConfigInterface](./primitives_memory_rolling_summary_config.RollingSummaryConfigInterface)

Configuration for rolling summary memory

  * Inherited
